### Description of the Required Services

The Public Prosecution Service of Canada (PPSC) requires the professional services of one (1) dedicated resource to deliver vicarious trauma counselling and compassion fatigue training to employees. The contractor will provide individual sessions, including phone conferences, to help employees identify, cope with, and reduce the risks associated with exposure to traumatic incidents related to criminal investigations and prosecution.

The contractor will also provide a one-on-one information session on vicarious trauma to new employees. The goal is to support employees in maintaining their well-being and performing their duties effectively in a challenging work environment.

**Duration of the Contract:**

The contract will commence on the contract award date and will continue until March 31, 2024.
